ViewTransition.summary: The ViewTransition interface of the {{domxref("View Transitions API", "View Transitions API", "", "nocode")}} represents a view transition, and provides functionality to react to the transition reaching different states (e.g. ready to run the animation, or animation finished) or skip the transition altogether.

remarks.para: This object type is returned by the method. When startViewTransition() is invoked, a sequence of steps is followed as explained in The view transition process. This also explains when the different promises fulfill.
-Smooth and simple transitions with the View Transitions API
